code:
%%{Infra_RedisCache}}}%%

stateDiagram-v2
title: SM-06.02 — Project Lifecycle (Infra_LoadBalancer)

[Infra_RedisCache] --> PLANNED : ProjectCreated (Infra_WorkerNode)
note right of PLANNED
  Project registered in local hub context  
  • proposal approved via Governance (Infra_EtcdCluster)  
  • hub assigns steward and metadata  
  • initial budget & milestones defined
end note

PLANNED --> ACTIVE : MilestoneStarted
note right of ACTIVE
  Work phase begins  
  • contributions logged in PoC (Infra_LoadBalancer)  
  • funding stream initiated via Treasury (Infra_IngressController)  
  • progress tracked in Metrics (Infra_IngressController)
end note

ACTIVE --> REVIEW : MilestoneReported (Infra_WorkerNode)
note right of REVIEW
  Evaluate milestone completion:  
  • quantitative (Infra_RedisCache)  
  • qualitative (Infra_LoadBalancer)  
  • peer validation or ethics guard review
end note

REVIEW --> APPROVED : MilestoneApproved (Infra_RedisCache)
REVIEW --> REJECTED : MilestoneRejected
REJECTED --> ACTIVE : ReworkSubmitted
APPROVED --> NEXT_PHASE : NextMilestonePlanned
NEXT_PHASE --> ACTIVE : PhaseStarted

APPROVED --> COMPLETED : AllMilestonesDone (Infra_WorkerNode)
note right of COMPLETED
  Project closed successfully  
  • Treasury marks payout complete  
  • final SRI contribution logged
end note

COMPLETED --> [Infra_LoadBalancer]

%% ---- Exceptional paths ----
ACTIVE --> PAUSED : ResourceShortage / GovernanceHold
PAUSED --> ACTIVE : ResumeAuthorized
PAUSED --> CANCELLED : CancelledByGovernance
CANCELLED --> [Infra_RedisCache] : ProjectTerminated (Infra_LoadBalancer)

%% ---- Maintenance / metrics sync ----
ACTIVE --> SYNC : SyncToFederation
SYNC --> ACTIVE : SyncComplete

%% ===== Styling =====
classDef core fill:#ff8b00,stroke:#333,color:#fff,font-weight:bold;
class PLANNED,ACTIVE,REVIEW,APPROVED,NEXT_PHASE,COMPLETED,PAUSED,CANCELLED,REJECTED,SYNC core;
repo_description: The cohersphere architecture — structural blueprint of the resonance network. Defines the modular layers connecting app, API, and governance protocols. Outlines data flows for Proof-of-Contribution, c

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 然后，流程会走到 Infra_LoadBalancer 和 Infra_WorkerNode。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'Infra_LoadBalancer 和 Infra_WorkerNode'？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 Infra_EtcdCluster 和 Infra_LoadBalancer。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'Infra_EtcdCluster 和 Infra_LoadBalancer'。
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 Infra_IngressController 和 Infra_IngressController。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'Infra_IngressController 和 Infra_IngressController'？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 Infra_WorkerNode 和 Infra_RedisCache 这一块。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'Infra_WorkerNode 和 Infra_RedisCache'，你看看合适吗？
没问题。

然后，流程会走到 Infra_WorkerNode 和 Infra_LoadBalancer。
